Package org.cougaar.core.agent

This package contains the Cougaar agent base class and bootstrapping components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AgentBootstrapService This service allows a component to modify its agent's list of components as it is being loaded, which is part of the agent's bootstrap process.
AgentComponentModelService This service allows a component to capture its agent's component model state.
AgentContainer The AgentContainer manages all agents on the node.
AgentStateModelService This service allows a component within the agent to transition the agent's state (suspend/resume/stop/unload).
ClusterContext Interface to the ClusterContextTable ThreadLocal that allows static deserialization clients to find the thread's agent address.
FindComponentsLoadService This service is used by the agent's component model rehydration to signal rehydration from a persistence snapshot, which must occur after the agent identity is acquired.
MessageSwitchShutdownService This service is used to shutdown the MessageSwitch during agent "suspend()" and restart the message switch during agent "resume()".
MessageSwitchUnpendService This service is used to "unpend" buffered messages at the end of agent load.
MobilityNotificationClient Callback API for MobilityNotificationService clients.
MobilityNotificationService This service allows MobilityNotificationClient clients to register for agent mobility callbacks.
ReconcileAddressWatcherService This service tracks blackboard message traffic, which is used to poll for agent restarts and force reconciliation in case state was lost.
ReconcileEnablerService This service is used to start and stop blackboard reconciliation when the agent is starting/stopping/etc.
RehydrateLoadService This service is used by the agent rehydration components to signal rehydration from a persistence snapshot, which must occur after the agent identity is acquired.
TopologyService This service is used by the MessageSwitch to obtain the local agent's incarnation number, which is updated every time the agent is rehydrated (but not on moves).
 

Class Summary
AcquireIdentity This component acquires the agent's security identity from the optional AgentIdentityService and transfers the identity when the agent moves.
Agent The abstract agent base class, which is subclassed by AgentImpl.
AgentImpl AgentImpl is the base class for all agents.
AgentManager A container for Agents.
AlarmComponent This component adds the agent's AlarmService, based upon the node-level RealTimeService and NaturalTimeService.
BeginLogger This component is loaded early in the agent, to announce the agent Loading/Starting/etc state transitions.
Bootstrap This component is the first component added to an agent, and is used to bootstrap the agent with the minimal initial components.
ClusterContext.DummyClusterContext A null ClusterContext.
ClusterContext.GroupDeliveryClusterContext A ClusterContext for delivery to groups.
ClusterContextTable Table of agent addresses on this VM, allowing static deserialization threads to find their agent's address.
ClusterContextTable.ContextState Internal object for keeping track of contexts.
ClusterContextTable.MessageContext A context for message deserialization, which includes the source and target addresses.
ClusterMessage The base class for blackboard messages, which pass through the agent's QueueHandler before entering the blackboard.
DemoControl This component adds the agent's DemoControlService.
DemoControlMessage A message sent by the DemoControl component to set the execution time on a single node, or to acknowledge another node's DemoControlMessage.
EndLogger This component is loaded late in the agent, to announce the agent Suspening/Stopping/etc state transitions.
Events This component generates EventService events to announce the agent's load/start/stop/etc and move.
FindComponentsEarly This component registers with persistence as the component model tracker and finds the agent's component descriptions in the rehydrated persistence snapshot.
FindComponentsLate This component uses the FindComponentsLoadService to tell the FindComponentsEarly component to read the persistence snapshot.
MessageSwitch This component registers the agent in the MessageTransportService and forwards all received messages through the MessageSwitchService to the agent-internal message handlers.
MessageSwitchShutdown This component invokes the MessageSwitchShutdownService during agent suspend and resume.
MessageSwitchUnpend This component invokes the MessageSwitchUnpendService at the end of the agent load.
NodeControlBlocker This component blocks the NodeControlService if the agent's address does not match the node's address.
QueueHandler This component buffers blackboard messages while the agent is loading, plus switches threads when receiving messages to avoid blocking the message transport thread.
Reconcile This component watches blackboard message traffic and periodically checks the white pages for agent restarts, which require blackboard-to-blackboard state reconciliation.
ReconcileEnabler This component uses the ReconcileEnablerService provided by the Reconcile component to enable and disable blackboard reconciliation.
RegisterAgent This component registers the agent with the node's RegisterAgentService, which is used to track dynamically added and removed agents.
RegisterContext This component registers the agent name in the ClusterContextTable, which is required for serialization and deserialization of persistence snapshots and messages.
RehydrateEarly This component rehydrates the agent persistence object and acts as a proxy for agent mobility state capture.
RehydrateLate This component uses the RehydrateLoadService to tell the RehydrateEarly component to read the persistence snapshot.
SimpleAgent Deprecated. see AgentImpl
Topology This component binds the agent's "version://" and "node://" information in the white pages, and preserves the incarnation across agent moves.
 

Package org.cougaar.core.agent Description

This package contains the Cougaar agent base class and bootstrapping components.

The top-level JVM Node loads the AgentManager, which will contain all the agents on the JVM. The AgentManager loads the configuration service (ComponentInitializerService) and the node agent AgentImpl, which is an agent named after the "-Dorg.cougaar.node.name" system property. Like all agents, the node agent's AgentImpl loads a single Bootstrap component that specifies the agent's initial component list. The bootstrap loads the minimal number of components necessary to read the XML configuration file and/or persistence snapshot, which will fill in the full agent configuration. The node agent's AgentLoader then instructs the AgentManager to load the other agents that should run on the node.

Many of the components in this package are not required by the bootstrap but are used in the standard agent XML/XSL template ($CIP/configs/common/SimpleAgent.xsl) to load basic services. For example, the MessageSwitch component is used to provide a common message transport service interface for components within the agent.

Also note that many of the components and services in this package act as "glue" to coordinate agent bootstrapping and mobility. For example, the MessageSwitch component is loaded early to allow other agent components to register MessageSwitchService handlers, such as the blackboard's QueueHandler. However, message delivery must wait until all components have loaded and had a chance to register their handlers, otherwise these early messages will be dropped. The MessageSwitch advertises a "glue" MessageSwitchUnpendService with an "unpendMessages()" method that will release the queued messages. A trivial MessageSwitchUnpend component is loaded late in the agent, after all the other components have been loaded, just to invoke the "unpendMessages()" method at the right time.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
